Golnoush Abaei Dr. Golnoush Abaei Lecturer, Industry Practice See full profile Details College: School of Computing Technologies Department: School of Computing Technologies Campus: City Campus Australia golnoush.abaei@rmit.edu.au ORCID: 0000-0002-8916-759X Open to Masters Research or PhD student supervision Industry Projects Collaborative projects About I am an experienced data specialist with expertise in designing models and developing solutions. In the IT industry, I worked as a software engineer and computer science specialist for many years and acquired a lot of knowledge. I have integrated my expertise in Industry with my academic profession to be able to find solutions for real-world applications. My research comprised of experiences in Software Engineering, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Data Analytics. My expertise expands to Software Quality, Correction of INS/GPS Navigation systems, Health-Related Recognition applications, and Blockchain…. I have also worked as a curriculum designer to employ the best practice utilizing various methodologies such as Problem-Based Learning (PBL), Active Learning, and Collaborative Active Learning (CAL). I strongly believe in learning and sharing my knowledge with my colleagues. Through years of experience, I have developed excellent communication, problem-solving, and organizational skills, along with good published papers. Expand for full bio Collapse bio Research fields 4612 Software engineering 461208 Software testing, verification and validation 4602 Artificial intelligence 4611 Machine learning 460306 Image processing Academic positions Program Manager - Bachelor of Software Engineering RMIT University School of Computing Technologies Melbourne, Australia 2 Oct 2023 – Present Professional Practice Lead RMIT University School of Computing Technologies Melbourne, Australia 28 Nov 2022 – Present Supervisor projects Resilient Privacy Infrastructure for Enterprise Security 13 Oct 2025 Automated Software Testing Using LLMs 23 Jul 2025 Machine Learning for Testing: Detecting Visual Defects in Software User Interface 6 Dec 2024 ENHANCING SOFTWARE ENGINEERING AND INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY EDUCATION WITH AI-POWERED DIGITAL LECTURER TWIN: A NOVEL APPROACH USING LARGE LANGUAGE MODELS 28 Nov 2024 Behavior Driven Development(BDD) Test Automation with Large Language Models(LLM) 14 Aug 2024 Teaching interests - Assist Software Engineering students in finding internships or graduate jobs for their 3rd-year internship course. - Coordinate and supervise capstone projects for SE undergrads and IT postgraduates sourced from international and local industries. - Software Testing Course Coordinator Research interests My research comprised of experiences in Software Engineering, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Data Analytics. My expertise expands to Software Quality, Correction of INS/GPS Navigation systems, Health-Related Recognition applications, and Blockchain….
